mapper.select: SELECT TI.TRAVEL_SEQ AS TRAVEL_SEQ, TI.LANDMARK_NAME AS LANDMARK_NAME, CI.CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME, CI.CITY_VIEWS AS CITY_VIEWS, CI.CITY_ADD AS CITY_ADD, CI.CITY_LATITUDE AS CITY_LATITUDE, CI.CITY_LONGITUDE AS CITY_LONGITUDE, CO.COUNTRY_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, TI.LANDMARK_ADDR AS LANDMARK_ADDR, TI.LANDMARK_EXP AS LANDMARK_EXP, TI.REGISTER_SEQ AS REGISTER_SEQ, TI.REGISTRY_DATE AS REGISTRY_DATE FROM SKYSEARCH.SS_TRAVEL_INFO AS TI INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_CITY AS CI ON TI.CITY_SEQ = CI.CITY_SEQ INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_COUNTRY CO ON CI.COUNTRY_SEQ = CO.COUNTRY_SEQ ORDER BY TI.LANDMARK_NAME ASC;

SELECT TI.LANDMARK_NAME AS LANDMARK_NAME, CI.CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME, CI.CITY_VIEWS AS CITY_VIEWS, CI.CITY_ADD AS CITY_ADD, CI.CITY_SEQ AS CITY_SEQ, CI.CITY_LATITUDE AS CITY_LATITUDE, CI.CITY_LONGITUDE AS CITY_LONGITUDE, CO.COUNTRY_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, TI.LANDMARK_ADDR AS LANDMARK_ADDR, TI.LANDMARK_EXP AS LANDMARK_EXP, TI.REGISTER_SEQ AS REGISTER_SEQ, TI.REGISTRY_DATE AS REGISTRY_DATE FROM SKYSEARCH.SS_TRAVEL_INFO AS TI INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_CITY AS CI ON TI.CITY_SEQ = CI.CITY_SEQ INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_COUNTRY CO ON CI.COUNTRY_SEQ = CO.COUNTRY_SEQ GROUP BY CI.CITY_NAME ORDER BY CI.CITY_VIEWS ASC;

select TI.TRAVEL_SEQ AS TRAVEL_SEQ, CI.CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME, CI.CITY_ENAME AS CITY_ENAME, CI.CITY_ADD AS CITY_ADD, CI.CITY_SEQ AS CITY_SEQ, CI.CITY_LATITUDE AS CITY_LATITUDE, CI.CITY_LONGITUDE AS CITY_LONGITUDE, CO.COUNTRY_SEQ AS COUNTRY_SEQ, CO.COUNTRY_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, CO.LOCAL_SEQ AS LOCAL_SEQ, LO.LOCAL_NAME AS LOCAL_NAME, TI.LANDMARK_NAME AS LANDMARK_NAME, TI.LANDMARK_ADDR AS LANDMARK_ADDR, TI.LANDMARK_EXP AS LANDMARK_EXP FROM SKYSEARCH.SS_CITY AS CI INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_TRAVEL_INFO AS TI ON CI.CITY_SEQ = TI.CITY_SEQ INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_COUNTRY CO ON CI.COUNTRY_SEQ = CO.COUNTRY_SEQ INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_LOCAL LO ON LO.LOCAL_SEQ = CO.LOCAL_SEQ where TRAVEL_SEQ = #{TRAVEL_SEQ}

select CI.CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME, CI.CITY_ENAME AS CITY_ENAME, CI.CITY_ADD AS CITY_ADD, CI.CITY_SEQ AS CITY_SEQ, CI.CITY_LATITUDE AS CITY_LATITUDE, CI.CITY_LONGITUDE AS CITY_LONGITUDE, CO.COUNTRY_SEQ AS COUNTRY_SEQ, CO.COUNTRY_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME, CO.LOCAL_SEQ AS LOCAL_SEQ, LO.LOCAL_NAME AS LOCAL_NAME FROM SKYSEARCH.SS_CITY AS CI INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_COUNTRY CO ON CI.COUNTRY_SEQ = CO.COUNTRY_SEQ INNER JOIN SKYSEARCH.SS_LOCAL LO ON LO.LOCAL_SEQ = CO.LOCAL_SEQ where CI.CITY_SEQ = #{CITY_SEQ}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SKYSEARCH.SS_COUNTRY ( COUNTRY_SEQ, LOCAL_SEQ, COUNTRY_NAME ) VALUES ( #{COUNTRY_SEQ}, #{LOCAL_SEQ}, #{COUNTRY_NAME} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE COUNTRY_NAME = #{COUNTRY_NAME}
